New Records: LeBron James and Bronny James made NBA history as the first father-son duo to play together as teammates.
Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 19 points, grabbed five rebounds, and had four assists in the 16 minutes he played.
Bronny James did not score during his nine minutes of play.
The Lakers lost to the Suns 118-114.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James emphasized the importance of hard work and accountability in a recent interview.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sunday’s preseason game against the Phoenix Suns coincided with Bronny’s 20th birthday.
